content:
path /v3/dogecoin/block/hash
operationId DogeGetBlock
parameters
description Block hash or height
in path
name hash
required True
schema
type string
summary Get Dogecoin Block by hash or height
description 1 credit per API callGet Dogecoin Block detail by block hash or height
responses
200
DogeBlock
type object
properties
hash
type string
description Hash of block
height
type number
description The number of blocks preceding a particular block on a block chain
size
type number
description The size of the block
confirmations
type number
description Number of confirmations of that block
weight
type number
description The weight of the block
version
type number
description Block version
previousblockhash
type string
description Hash of the previous block
merkleRoot
type string
description The root node of a merkle tree a descendant of all the hashed pairs in the tree
time
type number
description Time of the block
type number
nonce
type number
description Arbitrary number that is used in Litecoins proof of work consensus algorithm
txs
type array
DogeTx
type object
properties
hash
type string
description Transaction hash
size
type number
description Size of the transaction
type number
version
type number
description Index of the transaction
vin
description List of transactions from which assets are being sent
type array
items
type object
properties
txid
type string
description Transaction hash of the input
vout
type number
description Transaction index of the input
scriptSig
type object
properties
type string
type number
vout
description List of recipient addresses and amounts to send to each of them
type array
items
type object
properties
value
type number
description Amount of UTXO in 1/1000000 DOGE
n
type number
description Transaction index of the output
scriptPubKey
type object
properties
type string
addresses
type array
items
type string
description Recipient address
description OK
